turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want to order a grande caramel frappuccino Starbucks drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks should i order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks at in Duluth, Minnesota.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. did you need anything else from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 grande caramel frappuccino from starbucks on 331 west superior street will be $5.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order. it'll be ready for pick up in about 10 mins. the receipt has been sent to you via text.
